Description: System error detected: Nonvolatilememory checksum error (motorparameters)Parameter _SigLatched Bit 29

System error detected: Nonvolatilememory checksum error (control loopparameter set 2)Parameter _SigLatched Bit 29
System error detected: Nonvolatilememory checksum error (NoResetparameter)Parameter _SigLatched Bit 29
System error detected: Nonvolatilememory checksum error (hardwareinformation)Parameter _SigLatched Bit 29

Description: System error detected: Nonvolatilememory checksum error (data setsoperating mode Motion Sequence)Parameter _SigLatched Bit 29
System error detected:Communication with memory cardParameter _SigLatched Bit 20

Correctives: Retry saving the data.Replace the memory card.
